message: Fair split, let's end the game
You'll get less, I'll get more, it's only fair!
I'll give you a slightly smaller share, but it's still a good deal
You'll get peanuts, but I'll let you have something!
I'll give you a tiny share, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of
You'll get almost nothing, but it's better than nothing!
I'll give you a tiny bit, but I'm not going to get taken advantage of anymore
I'll give you the whole thing, but don't expect me to be nice next time!
